snippet: Workers striking at a Chinese-owned coal mine killed a Chinese supervisor when they hit him with a coal trolley, officials of the mine workers’ union said Monday.
abstract: Workers striking at Chinese-owned coal mine in Zambia kill a Chinese supervisor when they hit him with a coal trolley; employees staged a protest demanding their pay be raised to match Zambia's new minimum wage for laborers.
lead_paragraph: Workers striking at a Chinese-owned coal mine killed a Chinese supervisor when they hit him with a coal trolley, officials of the mine workers’ union said Monday.

headline.main: Zambia: Chinese Supervisor Dies During Protest at Mine
headline.print_headline: Zambia: Chinese Supervisor Dies During Protest at Mine
